attributes.action: I propose to give all UK residents a set air milage allowance per year to reduce carbon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By giving all uk residents a allowance to travel by air the people who do not choose to "fly" can sell thier allowance on. The people Who choose to fly on a frequent basis would then buy 
of the lower income residents,or people who choose not to fly.
This System will reduce carbon emissions and reward people for not flying.
